column6: 1. When operating new equipment for the first time I prefer to_Read the instructions
column7: 2. When seeking travel directions I_Look at a map
column8: 3. When cooking a new dish I_Follow a recipe
column9: 4. To teach someone something I_Write Instructions
column10: 5. I tend to say_I see what you mean
column11: 6. I tend to say_Let me try
column12: 7. I tend to say_Watch how I do it
column13: 8. Complaining about faulty goods I tend to_Write a letter
column14: 9. I prefer these leisure activities_Museums or galleries
column15: 10. When shopping generally I tend to_Look and decide
column16: 11. Choosing a holiday I_Read the brochures
column17: 12. Choosing a new car I_Read the reviews
column18: 13. Learning a new skill_I watch what the teacher is doing
column19: 14. Choosing from a restaurant menu_I imagine what the food will look like
column20: 15. When listening to a band_I sing along to the lyrics (in my head or out loud)
column21: 16. When concentrating I_Focus on the words or pictures in front of me
column22: 17. I remember things best by_Writing notes or keeping printed details
column23: 18. My first memory is of_Doing something
column24: 19. When anxious I_Visualize the worst case scenarios
column25: 20. I feel especially connected to others because of_How they look
column26: 21. When I revise for an exam, I_Write lots of revision notes
column27: 22. When explaining something to someone, I tend to_Show them what I mean
column28: 23. My main interests are_Photography or watching films or people watching
column29: 24. Most of my free time is spent_Watching television
column30: 25. When I first contact a new person_I try to get together to share an activity
column31: 26. I first notice how people_Look and dress
column32: 27. If I am very angry_I keep replaying in my mind what it is that has upset me
column33: 28. I find it easiest to remember_Faces
column34: 29. I think I can tell someone is lying because_They avoid looking at you
column35: 30. When I'm meeting with an old friend_I say "it's great to hear your voice!"
